message: Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for a competitive price of $1,400,000.  It's a great deal for both of us. What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1,200,000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns, but I need to make sure I get a fair price. I'm willing to come down to $1,300,000. This is a significant reduction from my initial offer, and I believe it's a good compromise. Let's see if we can reach an agreement.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm thinking more along the lines of $1,150,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure it fits within my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget constraints, but $1,150,000 is simply too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $1,250,000, which is a fair price considering the value of this product. This is my final offer. If you're not able to meet this price, I'll have to explore other options.
I'm still a bit above my budget with your latest offer. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go up to $1,225,000. I'm hoping we can find a mutually beneficial price.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While I value our negotiation,  $1,225,000 is still a bit too low. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $1,237,500.  This is my final offer.  If it doesn't work for you, I'll have to move on to other options.
I'm getting close to my budget, but $1,237,500 is still a bit too high. I'm willing to meet you at $1,200,000, which is the maximum I'm willing to pay. I hope we can finalize the deal at this price.
